title: Cannot submit ticket to recover account
body:
I am attempting to recover my main account and after I filled out all the information on the submit a request page it simply refreshes the page and takes me to the top.  No ticket created, no verification, no emails, no errors.
I have tried this on both Firefox and Chrome and the button still does nothing.
Help!

replies.body: I know you've tried another browser, but [clearing your cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) may assist with this, as well as trying Incognito Mode.  Incognito won't load any potentially conflicting browser extensions, and help to zero out reasons why this is happening.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=3uNr15Hx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-07T22:51:19.674+0000)
>
> I know you've tried another browser, but [clearing your cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) may assist with this, as well as trying Incognito Mode.  Incognito won't load any potentially conflicting browser extensions, and help to zero out reasons why this is happening.

I was able to get the ticket to work using incognito mode on Chrome, thank you for the assistance and sorry for the delay.
